data.title: Shuttle Bus
data.text:
Orange Route Shuttle Service

The UT Health San Antonio Orange Shuttle Route operates Monday through Friday from 7:00 am to 5:30 pm, excluding holidays. The route runs between the Long and Greehey campuses with seven listed stops. Please download the UT Health Shuttle live tracker app to view the shuttleâ€™s location.

UT Health San Antonio Shuttle Tracker

We are taking every precaution to ensure the shuttle buses are safe and clean for our UT Health community. Shuttle buses placed in operation are sanitized daily, in accordance with CDC guidelines, utilizing Virex II 256 disinfectant cleaner. Shuttle drivers will also wipe down handrails, grab rails, seats, and all high touch surfaces at the beginning of and during route operation.

All shuttle buses are equipped with touchless hand sanitizer dispensers, and seats have been cordoned off to enforce social distancing guidelines. Masks are required to be worn at all times while riding the shuttle.
